channel.title: Getting a cat, more ideas(not a tut)
channel.description: Is there anyway of getting a cat on to follow you around, not just to one location. even so, if this does get made we can change the npc number and have it as a body guard?? Maybe we can have it aggresive towards other npc's, so it will be like a real bodyguard so that people have to do quest's to have one! If anyone has a working code that would like to share please post it here. im working on it but i could do with some help! Thanks
